message.content: {"given_definition_quality":60,"better_definition":"left side","sentence":"他在左边。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style scene. Show a young man (simple, cartoon-like) standing on the left side of the image, perhaps next to a tree or on a grassy area. On the right side, leave empty space or show less focus to illustrate 'left'. The setting should be subtly post-apocalyptic with soft colors: slightly overgrown plants, gentle ruins in the background, and a peaceful atmosphere conveying hope amidst ruins. The word '左' is visible in the scene, incorporated naturally.","sentence_translation":"He is on the left side."}
